title: Hextech gunblade on Eve
body: Hey so still working out how to build eve in the new jg and after the buffs, and where im at right now is either devourer or juggernaut enchants into a triforce then botrk then randuins (im normally snowballing). Also I've been taking devourers mainly as I dont feel warrior is good on her as armour pen overall inst a great stat for her as by the end if a game half my damage is still magic, while at attack speed buff from e synergises well with the devourer. If i wasnt comfortable taking devourer I would just take juggernaut. But to the point with these items as my core almost every game should I be building a gunblade. it seems like a decent item just not sure its the best

Dude, Mobi Boots on Jungle Evelynn? Are you insane? Obviously you just want to keep the regular 325 gold boots. She gets enough move speed from Ardent Censor. So many scrubs on OCE, I swear.
Mate I beat a guy who claimed 2 b diamond, his main is on euw, search it up, "sp4zie", dun fak wit mi im bronze 4, compared 2 a bronze 5 scrub like u ima bajillion times better.

> [{quoted}](name=Wumachine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=pLwuN3XH,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-21T13:08:54.742+0000)

> Mate I beat a guy who claimed 2 b diamond, his main is on euw, search it up, "sp4zie", dun fak wit mi im bronze 4, compared 2 a bronze 5 scrub like u ima bajillion times better.

Umm... I played Evelynn once and fed super hard. Unlike a Bronze 6 scrub like you, I know how to play Evelynn. You need the gold you spend on upgrading your boots to get through your jungle item, so that you may rush the Ardent Censor for the attack speed you get from ulting, which equates to 0%. wtf Ardent Censor is glitched! It clearly says "Unique Passive: Your heals and shields on another unit grant them 25% attack speed for 6 seconds. This does not include regeneration effects or effects on yourself.", so why don't I get the attack speed bonus from shielding myself?

DONT TELL MI WOT 2 DO MUM IM 12 NOW IM A GROWN UP, Y DOSNT RUNAANS WORK IN EVE HER ULT IS LIKE 7 BILLION RANGE OMFG REPORT RIOT GLITCHED GAAAAAAAAAEEEEM WOW FEEDERS KEEPING ME IN ELO HELL I DESERBE 2 BE DIAMOND KOZ I BEAT ONE!!!!!!
youre trying so hard to be funny and its just not working out

zzrot is OP....but the rest is really odd...

why put a blatantly OP item into a set of troll items? for a moment i thought it was a legit build and was going to ask how ardent works on eve if self shields dont proc the passive...lol.
in what world did you think runaans wasn't a troll pick for eve XD
it didnt load for me at first, thats why when i went to comment i realized...

Gunblade stopped being useful on Eve 2 seasons ago.

Wasn't going burn build {{item:3151}} + {{item:3068}} the meta anyway?

{{item:3060}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3512}} {{item:3800}} {{item:3265}} 

dont need jungle item, just get the smite upgrade. if any, get the AP one until you have other CDR items.
Usually you can build Gunblade or Bork, not both. I mean, unless your going full damage, you really wouldn't want both.
